snippet.title: Skyweaver Explained: Everything You Need to Know About Our Web3 Game Market
snippet.description:
Hello Skyweavers! We know many of you have been eager to learn more about our economy. We are committed to building a sustainable game with an economy that serves our players. Skyweaver’s design sees you, and all other players, as the drivers and shapers of the economy, which is why we call it a player-owned economy. Horizon simply provides the tools you need to have fun and participate in it. The rest is up to you!


---

Welcome to Skyweaver! A worldwide competitive trading card game from another dimension. Customize your decks to suit any playstyle, gain the allegiance of ethereal creatures in Sky, and ascend the ranks to become a legendary Skyweaver!

Want even more info? Check our Megapost on the official Reddit to get started: https://www.reddit.com/r/SkyWeaver/comments/dr7n62/useful_links_megapost/

We livestream Skyweaver every week! View the full schedule on our blog: https://www.skyweaver.net/news/the-community-team 

Patch Notes Biweekly Stream
Every other Wednesday on Twitch: https://twitch.tv/skyweaverlive
17 PM ET (Toronto)
23 PM CEST (Europe)
14 PM PST (USA) 

Constructed Mayhem with Ashavari (Deck-Submission Stream)
Every Wednesday on Youtube
10:30 AM ET (Toronto)
16:30 PM CEST (Europe)
7:30 AM PST (USA)

Discovery Play & AMA with Marcelo: 
Every Friday on Twitch: https://twitch.tv/skyweaverlive
17:30 PM ET(Toronto)
23:30 PM CEST (Europe)
14:30 PM PST (USA)

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/skyweaver
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/skyweavergame
Instagram: https://instagram.com/skyweavergame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SkyWeaverOfficial/
Tiktok: https://tiktok.com/@skyweavergame

____________

Chapters
00:00 What is Skyweaver?
00:40 Player owned economy
01:29 Token & Liquidity providers
02:29 Where do the token reserves come from?
03:10 How are card prices determined?
04:49 How trading works?
05:18 What does true ownership really mean?
05:37 Summary
